the "fun" is that they can "always" win. Thats why.

How do you know the people you're playing against are ARAM accounts? A large section of the champion pool is overpowered in URF, probably somewhere around 60-70%. If everyone gets rerolls to choose a different champion, the odds that they **won't** get an overpowered champion after a single reroll are around 9%.

All these threads are complaining about "aram accounts" but how many of them have actual evidence that the accounts are made for ARAM? A lot of the OP champs are super simplistic and cheap champions like Tryndamere, which almost every account past lv 15 owns.
I'm just explaining to them what the op is talking about. Idk why you're so salty about it. and btw, trynd isn't really that good in aram XD.

aram accounts have champs that are "top tier" for aram. Those champs are not the same champs that are op on urf. Op urf champs are things like zed and eve, which aren't used on aram accounts.
Ezreal, Karma, Morgana, Blitz, Teemo, Sona, Ziggs, Zyra, Wukong, Xerath,  Maokai and many others are top tier in both urf and aram.
I'd argue against Zigg's being top tier in ARURF, but that's just because pretty much every other top tier pick counters him.
Most of the champions that are OP in ARAM are OP in URF for the same reason, long range safe damage or insanely high amounts of CC.

Feel yourself blessed, you basically won the lottery :D
